name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: ReGLOSS members speaking to the audience during the MC segment.
Transition with dramatic lighting and instrumental intro as the group takes formation.

subtitles.original: 次の曲で最後となっております！
subtitles.english: The next song will be the last one!

subtitles.original: いい？
subtitles.english: Is that okay?

subtitles.original: まだまだ一緒に盛り上がりたいみんなは、概要欄のリンクから見てください！
subtitles.english: Everyone who wants to keep partying with us, please check the link in the description!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Yeaaaah!

subtitles.original: みなちゃーん！ライブはね、まだまだ始まったばかりでちゅよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone! The live has only just begun!

subtitles.original: 最後までね、一緒に最高の時間を作ろう！
subtitles.english: Let's create the best time together until the very end!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Snow fall
subtitles.english: Snow fall

subtitles.original: 触れる上空
subtitles.english: Touching the upper sky

subtitles.original: 幻想と過ち
subtitles.english: Illusions and mistakes

subtitles.original: ノイズは砂嵐
subtitles.english: Noise is a sandstorm

subtitles.original: Slo-mo
subtitles.english: Slo-mo

subtitles.original: Come let me show you
subtitles.english: Come let me show you

subtitles.original: 戯けてみせる銀世界 Yeah yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: The silver world acting funny, yeah yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: If the sky is falling down
subtitles.english: If the sky is falling down

subtitles.original: If the stars had no shine
subtitles.english: If the stars had no shine

subtitles.original: 真っさらな紙の上
subtitles.english: On a blank sheet of paper

subtitles.original: 答え滲ませる
subtitles.english: Letting the answer blur

subtitles.original: すべて思うままに
subtitles.english: Everything as I wish

subtitles.original: 風が刻む 波の Melody
subtitles.english: The melody of waves carved by the wind

subtitles.original: Pandora Pandora ユメヲ Holding in my heart
subtitles.english: Pandora, Pandora, holding dreams in my heart

subtitles.original: 移ろい 色褪せぬように
subtitles.english: So it changes but never fades

subtitles.original: Pandora Pandora 秘密のオブジェ SKAVLA
subtitles.english: Pandora, Pandora, a secret object, SKAVLA

subtitles.original: SKAVLA Rum pum pum pum pum pum pum pum
subtitles.english: SKAVLA Rum pum pum pum pum pum pum pum

subtitles.original: 象る STAR SKAVLA
subtitles.english: Modeling STAR SKAVLA

subtitles.original: 灯す光 The sign of sprouting SKAVLA
subtitles.english: The lighting light, the sign of sprouting SKAVLA

subtitles.original: ワンクールのドラマよりも永い Fairy tale
subtitles.english: A fairy tale longer than a one-cour drama

subtitles.original: 嘘偽りなく Take this pain
subtitles.english: Without lies or falsehoods, take this pain

subtitles.original: 匙を投げた Plastic mind
subtitles.english: A plastic mind that gave up

subtitles.original: この世にオモテもウラもない
subtitles.english: There is no front or back in this world

subtitles.original: いつも違う表情 朧げな Irony
subtitles.english: Always different expressions, faint irony

subtitles.original: 一日を抱き締めてたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to embrace the day

subtitles.original: 沈む足跡
subtitles.english: Sinking footprints

subtitles.original: 怯む暇はない 上を目指そう
subtitles.english: No time to flinch, let's aim for the top

subtitles.original: In a world where no one's hurt
subtitles.english: In a world where no one's hurt

subtitles.original: I might not have become kind
subtitles.english: I might not have become kind

subtitles.original: 忍ばせて、仮初
subtitles.english: Hide it, transient

subtitles.original: 朽ちるまで待ち惚け
subtitles.english: Waiting in vain until it rots

subtitles.original: いずれ花になる
subtitles.english: Eventually it will become a flower

subtitles.english: The melody of waves carved by the wind

subtitles.original: 可能性が Swirling in a dance

subtitles.original: 幾層にも重なって
subtitles.english: Layered many times

subtitles.original: たゆたう歪に Ambivalence
subtitles.english: Ambivalence in the swaying distortion

subtitles.original: 振り解いた その向かい風
subtitles.english: That headwind I shook off

subtitles.original: SKAVLA Rum pum pum pum pum！！
subtitles.english: SKAVLA Rum pum pum pum pum!!

subtitles.original: 今こそ 切なる願い 打ち鳴らせ Wake up
subtitles.english: Now is the time, earnest wish, ring it out, Wake up

subtitles.original: そっと手を伸ばす 冬枯れの結晶
subtitles.english: Softly reach out hand, winter-withered crystal

subtitles.original: 閉ざしてしまいそうな夜だって
subtitles.english: Even on nights that seem about to close up

subtitles.original: この歌声で繋ぎとめてみせるから
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can tie it together with this singing voice
